channel.title: mp_timelimit in seconds instead of minutes as stated
channel.description:
mp_timelimit is in seconds instead of minutes like other source games (TF2, CSS etc). This causes problems with things like [url='https://www.sourcemod.net/']Sourcemod[/url] with mapchooser voting, since it sees it as minutes, not seconds - meaning no voting will show up. Would it be possible to change it back to minutes?
[code]mp_timelimit "mp_timelimit" = "900" ( def. "0" ) game notify replicated - game time per map in minutes[/code]

item.title: mp_timelimit in seconds instead of minutes as stated
item.dc:creator: MyBack
item.description:
I can confirm this, hope something is done about it soon.

Read full topic
item.source: mp_timelimit in seconds instead of minutes as stated
